data.title: LOVE THE WINE AND JAZZ
data.text: We had an awesome time sitting outside and enjoying the live jazz and sipping on the wine!  Very cool concept and super laid back!  We are planning on making this a place a regular stop for us when we come to Old Downtown!  We are wine lovers and really appreciate having a nice place to relax and unwind at the end of the week!

data.title: Fantastic Wines and Beers
data.text: Great place downtown to grab a glass of wine,  their wine dispensing machines offer wine by the taste, half glass, or full glass.  They always have a nice selection to choose from.  Enjoy the outdoor seating overlooking the market house and hay street.  Get good quality wines and beers you will not find elsewhere.  Staff is always friendly and very informed.

data.title: Cool vibe
data.text: We popped in here before a theater performance, wonderful and large variety selection with well displayed bottles and descriptors. Tastings available. Sitting areas looked inviting and decor was unique and trendy. They had a small selection of craft beers for the non wine drinker.

data.title: Great Selections
data.text: This place is a must for any wine lover spending time in the Fayetteville area. Selections change frequently enough to make this a place to frequent regularly. For a small fee you can sample the latest selections and enjoy  the comfortable and trendy setting.

data.title: Really neat place-a must go!
data.text: We stopped in while strolling downtown fayetteville and this is such a cool place! The employees behind the desk weren't very enthused, but the idea of a "wine cafe" is super neat, and their wine & alcohol options were super cool. I found a great beer that isn't sold in my state, so it was worth the experience!

data.title: Perfect for wine lovers
data.text: If you love wine, this place is worth going to at least once. They have bottles that you can choose to sample, half glass or full glass. You can buy a bottle and drink it there as well. The employees are wonderful as well. Knowledgable and kind. They have pairings to go with like cheese, breads, fruit. It's wonderful place to add to a date.
